name: Motion Design using Figma and Jitter | STEMpump Camps
description:
In this camp, we will be adding motion design to our Figma designs using Jitter. Jitter is an awesome web-based motion design tool. We'll start off with the basics of animating by making primitive animations in Figma and exporting them to Jitter. Then, we'll take a more advanced design of an app interface, and animate a demo of it. By the end, you'll be able to animate any design you have in Figma!


By the end of the camp, you'll be able to:

  • Figma Basics
  • Exporting to Jitter
  • Motion Design Basics
  • Animating within Jitter
  • Animating complex designs/interfaces


---


Watch the camp for free here.
